# Government Tender Announcement - ScaleUp008-001 Head Hunter "V2"

## Tender Details
* Reference Number: PW-23-01024670
* Tender Title: ScaleUp008-001 Head Hunter "V2"
* Tender Status: **Expired**
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2023, at 13:00:00 local time
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada

## Tender Description
This competitiveness-based solicitation is open to all qualified bidders. The Enterprise IT Procurement Branch (EITP) of Shared Services Canada is seeking the services of an experienced Headhunter with a natural gift for recruiting qualified candidates through networking systems and social media marketing to fill various positions related to procurement. The Headhunter will work with functional managers to proactively seek out qualified candidates to fill Senior Procurement Officers (PG-4) and Supply Team Leaders (PG-5) positions within the organization.

##Bid Requirements
The bid package includes 4 separate documents in both official languages (English and French). Bidders must ensure they have Adobe Acrobat reader to complete document A, the Bid Solicitation Form. The following documents must be completed:
* Bid Solicitation Form (BSF)
* Financial Bid Form
* ScaleUp Standard Instructions (to be read and reviewed)
Only the completed documents B and C should be returned to the contracting authority.

##Eligibility and Readiness Requirements
Bidders must be registered on Canada's digital marketplace to increase their visibility and access future opportunities. Additionally, bidders must obtain a Procurement Business Number (PBN) and register for the Procurement to Pay (P2P) system.

##Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on a comparative evaluation of the responses received. The evaluation criteria include the bidder's ability to meet the required qualifications, their experience in recruiting and headhunting, and their understanding of the procurement framework.

##Response Submissions
Please submit your responses to the contracting authority via the provided contact information.

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Morgan, James
* Contact Title: Senior Contracting Officer
* Contact Email: [james.morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:james.morgan@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: 604-715-7515
